description:
This protocol was built for Mass Spec sample prep for IPM doctors. It transfers a variable volume of reagent between 24 well input plate(s) and 24 well output plate(s). There are 3 custom labwares that this protocol normally uses - a 7ml tube rack (24 slot),  a 1ml autosampler tube rack (24 slot), and a 24 MCT laser cut acrylic rack.



Opentrons P300-multi channel electronic pipettes (GEN2)
Opentrons 200ul Filter Tips
24 well plate

markdown.author:
[Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)


# Opentrons has launched a new Protocol Library. This page won’t be available after March 31st, 2024. [Submit a request](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdYYp9QCKow4nn0KlCVsMS3HX0eJ0N9O7-erajKvcpT0lWbSg/viewform) to add this protocol to the new library.
markdown.categories:
* Nucleic Acid Extraction & Purification
	* Plant DNA
markdown.description:
This protocol was built for Mass Spec sample prep for IPM doctors. It transfers a variable volume of reagent between 24 well input plate(s) and 24 well output plate(s). There are 3 custom labwares that this protocol normally uses - a 7ml tube rack (24 slot),  a 1ml autosampler tube rack (24 slot), and a 24 MCT laser cut acrylic rack.

---
![Materials Needed](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/materials.png)


* [Opentrons P300-multi channel electronic pipettes (GEN2)](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-robot/products/8-channel-electronic-pipette?variant=5984202489885)
* [Opentrons 200ul Filter Tips](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/opentrons-200ul-filter-tips)
* [24 well plate](example.com)
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
markdown.process:
1. Load plates into proper deck slots. Sample plate at deck slot 2 will transfer into target plate at deck slot 5 and if there are more than 48 samples, sample plate at deck slot 3 will transfer into target plate at deck slot 6. 
2. Load tips at position 1. 
3. Run.
markdown.title: Mass spec sample prep

notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.
process:
Load plates into proper deck slots. Sample plate at deck slot 2 will transfer into target plate at deck slot 5 and if there are more than 48 samples, sample plate at deck slot 3 will transfer into target plate at deck slot 6. 
Load tips at position 1.
